## Some random plots from the Internet
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| layout-ncol: 2
#| fig-cap: 
#|   - "Speed and Stopping Distances of Cars"
#|   - "Vapor Pressure of Mercury as a Function of Temperature"
library(tidyverse)

ggplot(cars, aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point()

ggplot(pressure, aes(x = temperature, y = pressure)) +
  geom_point()
```
